    • Uses of Email in de.ityx.mediatrix.data

      Subclasses of Email in de.ityx.mediatrix.data 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Answer
      An answer is an information which results from a question and is sent from the operator to a customer.
      class  Emaillist
      The email lists are used to sent e.g. advertising emails to the certain customers.
      class  Question
      The class represents the incoming customer emails and outgoing service center emails.

      Methods in de.ityx.mediatrix.data with parameters of type Email 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Email.copy(Email myObj)
      If a duplicate copy is created and stored
      the metainformation id MUST be set to 0 ( MetaInformationInt.setId(int) )
      for (MetaInformationInt meta : question.getMetaInformationList()) {
      meta.setId(0);
      }
      In this case new objects of metainformations are created and the metainformations of origin question aren't lost.
